localize.text: Thankfully, you've been collecting energy ever since your very first day here, never missing a single day.
My role is to encourage you to collect the proper amount of energy each day by using the carrot and stick method.
It must have been hard to adapt to the corporation, but you tried your best to extract the energy.
Along with bearing the numerous sacrifices along the way.
It was also my role to advise you, to help free you from the guilt.
This part was particularly irritating because it wasn't in my programming, but I still was able to fulfill my role.
You might have noticed this earlier if you ever looked deeper into this company.
But the pipe used to emit energy to the outside hasn't worked for a long time. It is now very rusty.
That means energy collected from this branch is excluded from the total energy collected by Lobotomy Corporation.
Don't be too upset. I'm not saying that all the energy you collected was for nothing.
Also, there's one more thing for you to find out.
Where does all of this energy go?
